items.sentence: Tom will be surprised how difficult it'll be to do that.
Tom kept the store open until midnight on Christmas Eve.
Tom was the one who told me that Mary needed to do that.
Tom was with us the last time that we came to Australia.
Do you have difficulty breathing when you lie down flat?
Have you noticed a change in the size or color of moles?
I offered Tom thirty dollars to help me clean my garage.
Tom put his keys on the small table near the front door.
I bought one of the paintings, and Tom bought the other.
Do you think you could help me paint the fence tomorrow?
